name: email-service-studio
description: This is a codebase for creating a email server.

scripts.lint: npx prettier src/. --write --check && npx eslint src/.
scripts.build:client: npx tailwindcss build -i client/styles.css -o client/tailwind_styles.css --minify && cp -rf client/ dist/client
scripts.build:server: npm run lint && npx tsc && cp package.json dist && cp -rf public/ dist/public
scripts.build:all: npm run build:server && npm run build:client && npm run build:docs
scripts.local-build: npx tsc --build --clean && npm run build:all && cd dist && npm install --omit=dev
scripts.aws-eb: cp -rf .elasticbeanstalk/ dist/.elasticbeanstalk && cp -rf .platform dist/.platform && cp -rf .ebextensions dist/.ebextensions
scripts.build: rm -rf dist && rm -rf app.zip && npm run build:all && npm run aws-eb && cd dist && npm install --omit=dev

author: TsangSzeSze,CC
